column2: an A.M. Eatery////Ummmmm.... I don't know exactly where to start. I like quirky food
column3: but I also like tasty food. The food to me was more quirky than tasty. I got the steak eggs Benedict
column5: who orders Benedict with scrambled eggs
column7: could have been seasoned better. The grits cakes were pretty tasteless. I have heard great things
column8: but I don't think I would be back. Maybe out of curiosity.
